revisionDesc.change: Vote - AcceptText - The reading in l. 15 is good (I see ἀμ(φοδαρχίας) abbreviated at the end of l. 15, with a line over mu). In addition to BL 7.30 in l. 11, the name of strategos can be read as Σ]ε̣ρήν̣ωι, and following στρα(τηγῷ) we need Ἡρακλεοπ(ολίτου) (with a lunate final pi), rather than Ἡρακλέ(ους) | [πόλεως]. Add BL 7.30 to l. 12: υ̣ἱοῦ Μ̣έ̣λ̣α̣ν̣ο̣ς̣ (though really no dots are needed under the name). Yes, the same amphodarchia is found in l. 10, even if we can't see the horizontal over (π̣ρ̣ό̣τ̣ε̣ρ̣ο̣ν̣) -- it's no issue to have β in one place, δύο in another. Here the writer was running out of room, and I take the sinusoid at the end as the siglum for (ἀμφοδαρχίας), similar to that found for ἄμφοδον, which I discuss in a forthcoming article (for now cf. SB 20.14710 and van Minnen’s remarks, Tyche 6, 126). In l. 14 Ἡρακλέους is fully visible.
Vote - AcceptText - Encoding is now correct. A vote on this by another editor should be given, before this is finalized.

Submit - I (hope to have) correctly encoded l. 15-16 and furthermore, I added a BL correction in l. 11. I also suppose that there is another mention of the amphodarchia Horon dyo in l. 10, but I cannot see a horizontal stroke over the ἀ of ἀώρ̣ω̣ν̣ and I'm wondering why dyo would be abbreviated as β in l. 10 and written out in l. 15. I wouldn't want to change the brackets of Ἡρακλέους in l. 11 and 14, either.

Vote - Return-Straight-to-Sender - The new reading looks good to me, but please encode it like this: 15. [πόλεως ] <:[.?]ς τῆς ((πρότερον)) Ὥρων δύο <#=2#> ἀμ16.- [φοδαρχίας ]=PN L. Gericke (from image)|ed|[.?]στης ἀώρων δύο <#=2#> ἀμ16.- [φοτέρων (?)]:>. We encode the new reading and put the old reading in the apparatus by marking it up inline. See https://papyri.info/docs/leiden_plus#pnpe-correction for instructions. You should also look at line 10, I think, ἀώρ̣ω̣ν̣ δ̣.1 might possibly be ((πρότερον)) Ὥρων β. Just a quick thought. Also some of the brackets in lines 10 and 14 in the case of the word Ἡρακλέους should also be checked. Adding Berichtigungsliste corrections where they have not already been added is also very helpful and would benefit this text.

Submit - In l. 15, I corrected στης ἀώρων δύο ἀμ[φοτέρων into τῆς (πρότερον) Ὥρων δύο ἀμφοδαρχίας. There is a horizontal stroke diagonally over the α of what the editor read as "ἀώρων". This is an abbreviation for πρότερον. The Heracleopolitan district called πρότερον Ὥρων δύο is well attested, see e.g. SPP XX 25 l.

Commit - l. 15: I corrected στης ἀώρων δύο ἀμ[φοτέρων into τῆς (πρότερον) Ὥρων δύο ἀμ[φοδαρχίας. There is a horizontal stroke diagonally over the α of what the editor read as "ἀώρων". This is an abbreviation of πρότερον. The Heracleopolitan district called πρότερον Ὥρων δύο is well attested, see e.g. SPP XX 25 l. 7.
changed schema; added xml:space=preserve; indented; moved title/@n to idno
Converted from TEI P4 (EpiDoc DTD v. 6) to P5 (EpiDoc RNG schema)
